description:
When the Macross 7 launched, Exsedol joined Cpt. http://anidb.net/ch41156 [Maximilian Jenius] as an advisor aboard the http://anidb.net/ch49256 [Battle 7], and was a great source of information on the new and unknown (to the humans) enemy, the Protodeviln, though in earlier episodes Exsedol`s instinctive terror of the Protodevlin gets the better of him, and he prefers to hide away from the new enemy.
Source: wiki
name: Exsedol Folmo
